name: Oaken Bolter
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands one language of its creator but can\'t speak

traits.Magic Resistance: The oaken bolter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
